example.text: Biden's open border – which will only worsen when Title 42 is lifted – has invited over 30,000 migrants to illegally enter the US in the past 72 hours. Thankfully, this week the House will pass HR 2, [[user]]’s plan to secure our border & give CBP the resources they deserve. [[url]]

For nearly 40 years, we have failed to live up to our social contract with American senior citizens and to allow them to benefit from what they have invested and earned from this important safety net. I am encouraged about the desire to find targeted, bipartisan solutions to address this problem and make good on what has been done to shortchange public servants like teachers, firefighters, and police officers.

Biden's open border – which will only worsen when Title 42 is lifted – has invited over 30,000 migrants to illegally enter the US in the past 72 hours. Thankfully, this week the House will pass HR 2, [[user]]’s plan to secure our border & give CBP the resources they deserve. [[url]]

Biden does not have the will to do anything about the deluge of crime, drugs, and gang violence coming across our southern border. The president continues to placate the Left instead of putting our citizens and their safety first. [[user]] [[url]]

Biden's open border – which will only worsen when Title 42 is lifted – has invited over 30,000 migrants to illegally enter the US in the past 72 hours. Thankfully, this week the House will pass HR 2, [[user]]’s plan to secure our border & give CBP the resources they deserve. [[url]]

The defense authorization bill, while not perfect, provides the necessary resources for our warfighters and weapon systems to defend our freedoms and counter our adversaries like China and Russia. I am proud that this NDAA not only gave our troops the resources necessary to be safe and successful, but repealed Biden's disastrous vaccine mandate - an irresponsible and heavy-handed policy that ruined many careers and caused us to lose some of our best warriors.

Biden's open border – which will only worsen when Title 42 is lifted – has invited over 30,000 migrants to illegally enter the US in the past 72 hours. Thankfully, this week the House will pass HR 2, [[user]]’s plan to secure our border & give CBP the resources they deserve. [[url]]
